trait.name: Arch Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the warlock of ill omen's Darkvision and effects that conceal creatures from those who depend on dark vision do not effect the warlock of ill omen.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The warlock of ill omen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mad Mind (Concentration)
entries: The Warlock of Ill Omen can concentrate on three spells at once but cannot concentrate on the same spell more than once.

trait.name: Aura of Malice
entries: The Warlock of Ill Omen projects an aura that nullifies enemies resistance to damage types up to 30 feet.

actionHeader: The Warlock of Ill Omen is the conduit for an arch devil hellbent on corruption of others and thus benefits from their many pact boons.

action.name: multiattack
entries: Warlock of Ill Omen can attack with four beams of agonizing eldritch blast and cast a spell that cannot inflict damage, or, The Warlock of Ill Omen can instead choose to cast a spell of any of their choosing.

action.name: Agonizing Eldritch Blast
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 120 ft. or unlimited range, one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) force damage in melee, or 13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) force damage at range. On a successful hit, the creature is pushed away from the Warlock by 10 feet.

reactionHeader: Enhanced sight and reflexes granted by the Arch Fiend, N'watha.

reaction.name: Wrath of N'watha
entries: Upon taking damage, As a reaction, The Warlock emits shadowy veil that latches out toward the offending target. The Creature must make a {@dc 24} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

legendaryHeader: The Warlock of Ill Omen utilizes all of their power to emphasize their gods might. The Warlock can only take that one action per round.

legendary.name: Move (1 Action)
entries: The Warlock of Ill Omen teleports up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (1 Action)
entries: The Warlock casts a non damaging spell, but can only cast it once per round.

legendary.name: Cloak of Shadows (1 Action)
entries: The Warlock of Ill Omen shrouds themself in a cloud of darkness and renders themself {@condition invisible}. The invisibility ends when they cast a spell or take an offensive action.

monster.name: Walter, The Puppet Master of Noxra
Yoku, Daylight's Tiger

resist.note: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Sweeping Claws
entries: Daylight's Tiger rapidly sweeps up to 10 feet between claw attacks and anyone caught between his movement path is also subjected to the same attack.
While on the attack action, Yoku will evade opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: At the start of his turn, Daylight's Tiger will regain 35 hit points until he reaches 0 hit points.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Daylight's Tiger has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Immortal Lotus, Daylight's Tiger
entries: After throwing off his top as is mandatory, he digs both heels into the ground splitting the earth, stretches out his hands, and lets out a roar as the spectral tiger aura/celestial light bursts out from him.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/daily)
entries: If Daylight's Tiger fails a saving throw, they can instead choose to pass.

trait.name: Hidden Leaf within the Summers Vale
entries: If Daylight Tiger succeeds on a saving throw that deals half damage on a successful pass, they take no damage.

actionHeader: Daylight's Tiger is a ferocious opponent who specializes in offensive attacks for the sake of a good time.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: Daylight's Tiger will make up to four attacks with his Martial Arts, Spectral tiger claw attacks or make up to two Martial Arts or two tiger claw attacks and use Soul Ripper if available.

action.name: Spectral Tiger Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12({@damage 2d8 + 3}) Slashing (Magical) damage.

action.name: Immortal Lotus Style Martial Arts
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 2d12 + 12) Bludgeoning (Magical) damage}

action.name: Daylight's Tigers' Soul Reaper {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}50 ({@damage 9d10+1}) force damage.

Daylight's Tiger will erupt with a spectral tiger's head roaring behind his back as he punches into someone with such excessive force that it rips through their chest projecting the targeted creature's 'soul' outward 75 feet away from their body. While in this spirit form, the creature has access to all remaining resources, but can only affect themselves while their spirit remains outside of their body and cannot be targeted by others by any means. When the targeted creature returns its spirit to its body, it can resume its turn.

bonusHeader: Daylight's Tiger emits a terrifying presence as he radiates with celestial light.

bonus.name: Unrivaled under the Heavens {@recharge 5}
entries: Daylight's Tiger will emit a horrifying roar. Creatures within 120 feet must make a {@dc 23} Wisdom Saving Throw or be subjected to the {@condition frightened} condition. Creatures affected by the {@condition frightened} condition from his roar can repeat the saving throw at the end of their turn. When the saving throw succeeds, they will become immune to the effect of 24 hours.

bonus.name: Autumn's Sunset Dash.
entries: Daylight's Tiger can move up to his movement speed to close the distance with an enemy target.

bonus.name: Spring Lotus Step
entries: Daylight's Tiger becomes surrounded by silvery mist and teleports up to 30 feet away.

reactionHeader: Daylight's Tigers' reaction timing matches his new found youth.

reaction.name: Menacing Stare
entries: Daylight's Tiger turns his glare on a hostile creature within 120 feet causing a distraction that triggers momentary uncertainty. The triggering creature must reroll the {@dice d20} and use the lower roll.

reaction.name: Battle Fervor
entries: Upon witnessing a foe within 120 ft reach 0 hit points, Daylight's Tiger will receive 25 temporary hit points.

legendaryHeader: Daylight's Tiger will utilize his battle tactics to gain the upper hand in a brawl. Utilizing many centuries of maneuvers and different tactics.

legendary.name: Lotus Bloom's Leap (Move)
entries: Daylight's Tiger will slam his feet deep into the ground and leap to his movement to a creature they can see. The creature must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Daylight's Tiger (Avatar) (2 Actions)
entries: Daylight's Tiger will manifest an immortal spirit guardian representing a spectral tiger. The tiger can take actions such as Lotus Bloom's Leap and make two claw attacks 6({@dice 1d10}) after the end of Daylight's Tigers' turn. Once manifested, the spirit guardian persists until Daylight's Tiger has been defeated or the spirit has been defeated.

monster.name: Zasra, Necro Lord of Noxra

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zasra is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (DC24) +16 to hit with spell attacks). He can cast thee following spells with no components

spellcasting.name: Innate (Somatic and Verbal) Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zasra is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (DC24) +16 to hit with spell attacks). He can cast these spells with no material components.

trait.name: River of Bones
entries: At will, Zasra can take flight via stepping on an ever shifting pile of bones that shall act as his mount.

trait.name: Master of Souls
entries: Zasra projects a 60 foot aura which at will can deny all forms of healing.

trait.name: Necromancer's Special Tools
entries: Zasra is in possession of several items that enables his necromancy:
Grimoire of the Soul Ravager.
Staff of the Wandering Moon.
A Celestial Tuning Rod which controls the spirit of a fallen aasimar.
Robe of the Arch Necromancer (Magi Reflavored).

trait.name: Unstoppable (8/day)
entries: Zasra reduces the damage he takes from an attack to 0.

trait.name: Staff of the Wandering Moon {@recharge 5}
entries: Zasra can channel Noxra at will and change the spell damage type to necrotic and maximize the damage of his next spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Zasra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actionHeader: Zasra is an ancient lich that has taken to hosting various living flesh made necrotic puppets.
bonusHeader: Zasra's control over necromantic magic has given him keen

bonus.name: Bone Step
entries: Zasra can teleport up to his movement speed to a place that he can see.

reactionHeader: Zasra's connection to Noxra has given him in calculating his opponents actions.

reaction.name: Harvest of Souls
entries: If a creature that Zasra can see falls to 0 hit points, Zasra can use their reaction to regain 30 temporary hit points.

legendaryHeader: One of Noxra's most devoted priests shall wield their command with his gods unholy blessing.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (1 Action)
entries: Zasra takes an action to cast a spell.

legendary.name: Purge Magic (1 Action)
entries: Zasra will select one creature within range and attempt to purge a spell's effect with a Intelligence check. Zasra can make a Wisdom check to nullify a spell that has been cast. She will choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher on the target, Ellie will make an ability check using her spellcasting ability (Intelligence). The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a successful check, the spell ends.

legendary.name: Whisper of the Wandering Moon (1 Action)
entries: Zasra can select a creature that he can see and swarm them with the souls of all those he has slain and consumed. The target must make a DC24 Wisdom Saving Throw or become subjected the blind condition and take a level of {@condition exhaustion}. The effect will end at the end of the creature's next turn.
